chat.title: Assistant Chat
chat.quickTips: ‚Üê Use the ‚ò∞ menu for quick questions
chat.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support speech recognition. Try Chrome or Edge.
chat.microphonePermission: Please allow microphone access in your browser

quickActions.greeting: Hello InA! Could you help me with
quickActions.thanks: Thank you very much for your help InA, WAH!
quickActions.internships: Could you explain the Internship process at DuocUC?
quickActions.faq: Could you give me more information about DuocUC?
quickActions.tne: Could you explain the TNE acquisition/validation process at DuocUC?

feedback.initialQuestion: Was this response from Ina helpful?
feedback.thankYouImprove: Thank you for helping us improve!
feedback.improvementQuestion: Could you tell us more about how we can improve?
feedback.commentsPlaceholder: Ex: The response was too technical, I needed more practical details...
feedback.thankYouFinal: ‚úÖ Thank you for your feedback! Your opinion helps improve Ina.

chat.feedbackServerError: Error sending feedback. Please try again.
chat.feedbackConnectionError: Connection error. Please verify that the server is running.

Lobby.title: Welcome, I'm InA
Lobby.Descripcion: Your virtual assistant for queries about Duoc UC. How can I help you today?

Preguntas.FAQ2: How can I enroll in an academic program at Duoc UC?
Preguntas.FAQ3: Where can I renew my TNE?
